title: Possible to transfer (to EUW) after the patch?
body:
Hello,

Yesterday I began looking for how to transfer my account (EUW) and it seems that since the patch there are no transfers allowed until Nov. 20th.

Would there be anyway to transfer prior to that date, or must I wait to be able to transfer?

Thank you kindly

replies.body: We aren't able to offer anymore transfers due to the season coming to and end until November 20.  :(  You'll have to hang tight until the feature returns.
